title: I like the new mordekaiser.
body:
I still don't see quite where he fits in. but i really like him, he is less of a one man army now and is really team oriented, plus his W is really cool, the Q is a bit too powerful i think haha and the dragon thing is a bit of a gimmick but it does at least make you more aware of drag control cos its fun to have a pet. 
but he is really cool, well done riot.

replies.body: his q one shots its stupid
